title: Adobe Acrobat Pro DC Genuine Software Service Incorrect Permission Assignment Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows local attackers to escalate privileges on affected installations of Adobe Acrobat Pro DC. An attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability.
The specific flaw exists within the Adobe Genuine Software Service. The issue results from incorrect permissions set on a resource used by the service. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to escalate privileges and execute code in the context of SYSTEM.
addtionnal_details: Adobe has issued an update to correct this vulnerability. More details can be found at:https://helpx.adobe.com/security/products/integrity_service/apsb20-12.html
timeline:
2019-12-04 - Vulnerability reported to vendor
2020-03-19 - Coordinated public release of advisory
